name: Cable Guys
description:
Survival of 2 bots depends on you. They are joined together by a cable. If the cable breaks, the bots are destroyed. Help them survive as long as possible.

The cable breaks if:

  • The cable is extended beyond a certain limit.
  • The cable hits a burning barrel.

Use W, A, S, D keys to control one bot. The other bot is controlled by the mouse.
